tool.name: tool_11
tool.summary: Import Erdas LAN/GIS files. The format analysis is based on the GRASS tool i.in.erdas. Go to the GRASS GIS Hompage for more information.

dataIdInfo.idCredit: Conrad, O., Bechtel, B., Bock, M., Dietrich, H., Fischer, E., Gerlitz, L., Wehberg, J., Wichmann, V., and Boehner, J.
